intro: Play smart, stay kind — the Alfie Atkins way!
description:
Discover the gentle, clever world of Alfie Atkins, the beloved Scandinavian character loved by children and parents around the globe!
Now Alfie invites you to join him for five classic logic games — perfect for curious minds and calm moments of play.
 
Train your memory, sharpen your strategy, and enjoy screen time that’s wholesome, friendly, and full of quiet joy.
Play alone or together on one console, share the fun with your friends!
 
Includes:
 
• Tic-Tac-Toe
• Checkers
• Memory Game
• Sweeper
• Gomoku
 
With warm visuals inspired by Gunilla Bergström’s timeless stories, Alfie Atkins Game Collection combines learning, imagination, and play — the Scandinavian way.

Everyday life wrapped in magic!
